publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-685 Cathy Jamieson: Modernising Access to Legal Advice, Information and Representation-That the Parliament notes the progress made to date on modernising access to legal advice, information and representation; agrees the importance of increasing access to justice through a better and more consistent provision of legal information and advice throughout Scotland, and welcomes the strategic review of the delivery of legal aid, advice and information as a means of ensuring a better and more efficient public service in line with the needs of Scottish citizens. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
